column2: Having been born and raised aboard a spacefaring vessel, this character is considered a true Astrist and a noble soul unbound by gravity.
This character was born within the confines of a planet's gravity, a source of derision and dismissal from spaceborn Astrists.

In spite of circumstances of birth, this character has, through exceptional service in the fleet, loosed the shackles about their soul and become a true Astrist. All present and future descendants will be treated as normal Unbound.
